authorAttributions.displayName: Dr Francesco Gargano, MD, PHD, FACS
Dr Francesco Gargano, MD, PHD, FACS

adrFormatAddress: 787 Park Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Gargano is Beyond Amazing! Even if my Procedure is purely Cosmetic…I know I’m in Good Hands because he is a Highly Skilled Surgeon.
He always starts with a very good Consultation and will ask you what you want to achieve + will also tell you what it takes to achieve a Natural Look. He discusses Facial Symmetry + Proportions.
He knows the Architecture of the Face!

originalText.text: Dr. Gargano is amazing! I’ve been a few places for my Botox and he is the best. He always discusses what he is doing with you and is great at achieving that natural look while smoothing everything out.

text.text: Dr. Gargano is amazing! I’ve been a few places for my Botox and he is the best. He always discusses what he is doing with you and is great at achieving that natural look while smoothing everything out.

originalText.text:
Professor Gargano is not just a surgeon of rare skill and expertise but stands as a pinnacle of excellence in the field of plastic surgery. Having the privilege to entrust our IT Manager into his capable hands has been a blessing.

Regardless of the operation's complexity, reducing a nasal fracture can be a delicate procedure, both physically and aesthetically. Yet, under Professor Gargano's guidance, the process was managed with utmost care, precision, and attention to detail.

What struck us most, beyond his undisputed professionalism, was his remarkable ability to listen. In a time of anxiety and concern for our colleague, Professor Gargano provided reassurance, offering clarity on every aspect of the operation and showing genuine attention to the patient's concerns and wishes.

Paolo Silva

originalText.text: Dr. Gargano's surgery went flawlessly. Both he and the accompanying staff are beyond exceptional. The aftercare was superb. They make you feel like family because they call to check-in on your progress.

text.text: Dr. Gargano's surgery went flawlessly. Both he and the accompanying staff are beyond exceptional. The aftercare was superb. They make you feel like family because they call to check-in on your progress.

originalText.text:
I underwent a rhinoplasty procedure performed by Dr. Gargano back in November and I cannot express how thrilled I am with the results. I'd like to start by saying Dr. Gargano is an EXCEPTIONALLY skilled plastic surgeon who truly understands the artistry and science behind his work. His entire team is warm, caring, and provided me with the support I needed from initial consult to post-op (I'm at 6 months post-op now and they continue to provide me with outstanding care). The results of my rhinoplasty are simply remarkable. Dr. Gargano beautifully sculpted my nose to achieve a natural-looking result that harmonizes perfectly with my facial features. I had some difficulty breathing pre-op as well due to a nose fracture from years ago, and I feel more confident and satisfied than ever before. The office staff and nurses are absolutely incredible too - friendly, efficient, and accommodating, ensuring that every visit was pleasant and stress-free!!!

All I can say is, if you are seeking natural, transformative results and an overall positive experience, you can trust Dr. Gargano to get it done!!!!
